name: LabyStudio - YouTube Hate function
description:
YouTube Hate function.

Features:
# Replaces the dislike button into a hate button
# Display bright and colored likes and dislikes.
# YouTube Ratings Bar Color & Glow
# Better Like and Dislike Button
# Better Videoviews Box
